description: This file defines the NotesViewModel class responsible for managing notes data and interactions with a remote API in a notes application. It includes methods for fetching, creating, updating, and deleting notes via Retrofit API calls.

classes.name: NotesViewModel
classes.description: A ViewModel class that manages notes data, handles API calls for fetching and manipulating notes, and maintains UI state related to notes.

methods.name: fetchNotes
methods.description: Fetches a list of notes from the API using a provided token, and executes callbacks on success or error.

methods.name: fetchNote
methods.description: Retrieves a specific note by ID from the API, handling success and error states.

methods.name: createNote
methods.description: Creates a new note on the server with the specified title and content, using a token for authentication.

methods.name: updateNote
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by noteId with new title and content.

methods.name: deleteNote
methods.description: Deletes a note identified by noteId from the server.
